body_html:
Just reproduced the error again in the container. Only 4 megs of the archive are getting downloaded. Is there a workaround I can do to patch this? Is it possible to direct bazel to use wget or use different HTTP file transfer settings?

ERROR: /tmp/tensorflow-knureon/tensorflow/tools/pip_package/BUILD:85:1: no such package '@llvm//': java.io.IOException: Error downloading [https://mirror.bazel.build/github.com/llvm-mirror/llvm/archive/8f7bcdf3c65b9a47e35653d525135beb18f3ac25.tar.gz, https://github.com/llvm-mirror/llvm/archive/8f7bcdf3c65b9a47e35653d525135beb18f3ac25.tar.gz] to /root/.cache/bazel/_bazel_root/0726af6ab00d84b2e399e1660b859bdb/external/llvm/8f7bcdf3c65b9a47e35653d525135beb18f3ac25.tar.gz: Premature EOF and referenced by '//tensorflow/tools/pip_package:licenses' ERROR: Analysis of target '//tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package' failed; build aborted: no such package '@llvm//': java.io.IOException: Error downloading [https://mirror.bazel.build/github.com/llvm-mirror/llvm/archive/8f7bcdf3c65b9a47e35653d525135beb18f3ac25.tar.gz, https://github.com/llvm-mirror/llvm/archive/8f7bcdf3c65b9a47e35653d525135beb18f3ac25.tar.gz] to /root/.cache/bazel/_bazel_root/0726af6ab00d84b2e399e1660b859bdb/external/llvm/8f7bcdf3c65b9a47e35653d525135beb18f3ac25.tar.gz: Premature EOF INFO: Elapsed time: 187.525s FAILED: Build did NOT complete successfully (172 packages loaded) root@5224ce0ce952:/tmp/tensorflow-knureon# cd ~/.cache/bazel/_bazel_root/ 0726af6ab00d84b2e399e1660b859bdb/ cache/ install/ root@5224ce0ce952:/tmp/tensorflow-knureon# cd ~/.cache/bazel/_bazel_root/0726af6ab00d84b2e399e1660b859bdb/external/llvm/ root@5224ce0ce952:~/.cache/bazel/_bazel_root/0726af6ab00d84b2e399e1660b859bdb/external/llvm# ll total 4104 drwxr-xr-x 2 root root 4096 Apr 20 19:27 ./ drwxr-xr-x 52 root root 4096 Apr 20 19:27 ../ -rw-r--r-- 1 root root 4194304 Apr 20 19:28 8f7bcdf3c65b9a47e35653d525135beb18f3ac25.tar.gz root@5224ce0ce952:~/.cache/bazel/_bazel_root/0726af6ab00d84b2e399e1660b859bdb/external/llvm# sha256sum 8f7bcdf3c65b9a47e35653d525135beb18f3ac25.tar.gz 0c0ceed4f1c039dd9ba8e19987bfa64b6a5d1db48804b3ed8480e4a5efe7dc55 8f7bcdf3c65b9a47e35653d525135beb18f3ac25.tar.gz
body_text:
Just reproduced the error again in the container.  Only 4 megs of the archive are getting downloaded.  Is there a workaround I can do to patch this?  Is it possible to direct bazel to use wget or use different HTTP file transfer settings?
ERROR: /tmp/tensorflow-knureon/tensorflow/tools/pip_package/BUILD:85:1: no such package '@llvm//': java.io.IOException: Error downloading [https://mirror.bazel.build/github.com/llvm-mirror/llvm/archive/8f7bcdf3c65b9a47e35653d525135beb18f3ac25.tar.gz, https://github.com/llvm-mirror/llvm/archive/8f7bcdf3c65b9a47e35653d525135beb18f3ac25.tar.gz] to /root/.cache/bazel/_bazel_root/0726af6ab00d84b2e399e1660b859bdb/external/llvm/8f7bcdf3c65b9a47e35653d525135beb18f3ac25.tar.gz: Premature EOF and referenced by '//tensorflow/tools/pip_package:licenses' ERROR: Analysis of target '//tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package' failed; body:
Just reproduced the error again in the container.  Only 4 megs of the archive are getting downloaded.  Is there a workaround I can do to patch this?  Is it possible to direct bazel to use wget or use different HTTP file transfer settings?

`
ERROR: /tmp/tensorflow-knureon/tensorflow/tools/pip_package/BUILD:85:1: no such package '@llvm//': java.io.IOException: Error downloading [https://mirror.bazel.build/github.com/llvm-mirror/llvm/archive/8f7bcdf3c65b9a47e35653d525135beb18f3ac25.tar.gz, https://github.com/llvm-mirror/llvm/archive/8f7bcdf3c65b9a47e35653d525135beb18f3ac25.tar.gz] to /root/.cache/bazel/_bazel_root/0726af6ab00d84b2e399e1660b859bdb/external/llvm/8f7bcdf3c65b9a47e35653d525135beb18f3ac25.tar.gz: Premature EOF and referenced by '//tensorflow/tools/pip_package:licenses'
ERROR: Analysis of target '//tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package' failed; build aborted: no such package '@llvm//': java.io.IOException: Error downloading [https://mirror.bazel.build/github.com/llvm-mirror/llvm/archive/8f7bcdf3c65b9a47e35653d525135beb18f3ac25.tar.gz, https://github.com/llvm-mirror/llvm/archive/8f7bcdf3c65b9a47e35653d525135beb18f3ac25.tar.gz] to /root/.cache/bazel/_bazel_root/0726af6ab00d84b2e399e1660b859bdb/external/llvm/8f7bcdf3c65b9a47e35653d525135beb18f3ac25.tar.gz: Premature EOF
INFO: Elapsed time: 187.525s
FAILED: Build did NOT complete successfully (172 packages loaded)
root@5224ce0ce952:/tmp/tensorflow-knureon# cd ~/.cache/bazel/_bazel_root/ 
0726af6ab00d84b2e399e1660b859bdb/ cache/                            install/                          
root@5224ce0ce952:/tmp/tensorflow-knureon# cd ~/.cache/bazel/_bazel_root/0726af6ab00d84b2e399e1660b859bdb/external/llvm/

total 4104

0c0ceed4f1c039dd9ba8e19987bfa64b6a5d1db48804b3ed8480e4a5efe7dc55  8f7bcdf3c65b9a47e35653d525135beb18f3ac25.tar.gz
